member.summary:
Handles the addition of a custom shortcode. NOTE: This method should be overridden to attach functionality to the shortcode after its addition (ex. the data storage save) has been completed! Ex. Attach a context menu to the shortcode. NOTE: This method is called both when a custom shortcode is created and on the
method where all the pre-existing custom shortcodes are retrieved and placed in the container!
member.param: The shortcode
